metadata.title: CVE-2023-5561 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: WordPress does not properly restrict which user fields are searchable viathe REST API, allowing unauthenticated attackers to discern the emailaddresses of users who have published public posts on an affected websitevia an Oracle style attack

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
